description:
<--( RELEASE )--------------------------------------------------------------->
TITLE........: CHEMISTRY, 10TH EDITION

PUBLISHER....: CENGAGE                   -  LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH
LINK.........: http://www.cengage.com/aushed/instructor.do?disciplinenumber=1074&product_isbn=9781133610663&filter=Book
RELEASE TYPE.: RETAIL        
FORMAT.......: PDF                       -  RELEASE DATE..: 2013/07/21    
ISBN.........: 9781133610663             -  STORE DATE....: 2013      
AUTHOR.......: KENNETH W. WHITTEN        -  DISKS.........: 12
               RAYMOND E. DAVIS
               LARRY PECK
               GEORGE G. STANLEY

SAVED MONEY..: 120 DOLLAR

<--( BOOK )------------------------------------------------------------------->
This new edition of CHEMISTRY continues to incorporate a strong molecular 
reasoning focus, amplified problem-solving exercises, a wide range of real-life 
examples and applications, and innovative technological resources. With this 
text's focus on molecular reasoning, your students will learn to think at the 
molecular level and make connections between molecular structure and 
macroscopic properties. The Tenth Edition has been revised throughout and now 
includes a reorganization of the descriptive chemistry chapters to improve the 
flow of topics, a new basic math skills Appendix, an updated art program with 
new "talking labels" that fully explain what is going on in the figure, and 
much more.
